dashboardMetadata.name: GOV.UK One Login - Service - Sign In/Sign Up

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## MFA Reset With IPV Responses
These are the responses returned from IPV when a user has attempted to go through an identity reverification journey.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## How many cross browser errors have there been?

This is a count of cross browser errors during the MFA reset with identity reverification journey.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Total Sign Ins

This metric is computed from the signIn Metric from the Auth team.

This relates to the user using the signin service for OneLogin.

The SignIn is split by Relying Party (where the RP is the external service) which is a further level of detail.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Total Account Creations/Signups

This graph derives from the signin metric within the Auth service.

The SignUp is split by Relying Party (where the RP is the external service) which is a further level of detail.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Total HMRC Document Checking Journeys

This graph shows the HMRC identity proving non-auth journeys. These journeys go through Orchestration and DCMAW.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Core Identities Claimed

This graph shows when a Relying Party has issued an identity. This isn't entirely clear.

The metrics are client ids. The Auth team needs to add a client name to the Id.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Credentials Issued


This graph shows the number of credentials issued by type of credential.

The Credentials Issuer teams sit within the Identity Pod.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## Front-Channel Logout
This shows how many users have logged out using the One Login logout button.

This shows client ids rather than client names. The Auth team would need to update this to show the client names.


## Sign Ins by RP
This shows the number of sign ins per relying party. 

## Sign Ups by RP
This shows the number of signups per RP.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## How many sign ins are existing accounts?

This is the ratio of sign ins to sign ups, excluding smoke tests.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown:
## How are reauth journeys progressing?

A look at how many have started, succeeded and failed.

tiles.name: Markdown
tiles.markdown: ## How many RP requests are rate-limited?
